item.title: Day 3 Session 7
item.description: ▶ Day 3 Session 7 Panel 1 NAME ROOM NUMBER 1 SPECIALIST GROUP NUMBER 1 STUDENT POLITICS: The darkest corner of the ‘secret garden’ of political recruitment Ms IANTHI STERGIOU, Birkbeck, University of London The Contributions of Self-Defense Groups to (In)Security in Burkina Faso Mr Francis Asante, University of Bristol The ‘Communitarian’ Critique of Social Democracy, 1948-1997 Dr Nick Garland, University of Oxford ▶ Day 3 Session 7 Panel 2 NAME ROOM NUMBER 2 SPECIALIST GROUP NUMBER 2 Do Stand-Alone Transition Modules Help First-Year Politics Students?
